name: Genetsis
description:
Genetsis is an agency specialized in designing, developing and managing marketing strategies in digital environments.
Integrated digital communication, user experience design and relational marketing are some of Genetsis's specialties.
With more than 17 years of experience, Genetsis has designed and executed over 200 projects for companies such as Coca-Cola, Iberdrola, Telefonica, Grupo Mahou-San Miguel, L'Or√©al, Bimbo and many others.
